name: Verify Camera Shows 0/1 Scannable Object Counter
description: Validates that the camera system in region 1 correctly displays 0/1 indicating one scannable object available.
testObjective: Ensure camera UI correctly indicates scannable object availability in region 1.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has not yet scanned any planets

steps.action: Observe the overlay display in the top right corner
steps.expected: Display shows '0/1' indicating 0 scanned out of 1 available scannable object

postconditions: Camera correctly indicates scannable object is available
